body: Learn about Kabissa online platfrom and network in Africa: "As of this writing, Kabissa has 1,558 approved organizations in the network, 215 of them new in 2011, that have been taking excellent advantage of Kabissa to showcase themselves and connect with each other for peer learning and information sharing."

title: Africa: Kabissa Network and Online Platform
